divs: Sighting DetailsThis event was a sound only. I was in a parking lot next to a restaurant near anairport. A loud sound that had several pitches swirled around the area. Itsounded like what you would expect in a UFO movie. The noise went in a circulardirection and seemed to reflect off nearby buildings. My first thought was I wasimagining what I heard, but I turned to see the expression on my sons face and afamily several yards away standing in amazement so I knew it was real. When myson and I walked past the family, they asked us if we saw anything---no, andneither had they. Neither my son, nor I know what to think, but it definatelywas something most people never hear. Thats it.
trends: There have been 68 other sightings in Pensacola
There were no other sightings in Pensacola on or around January 18th 0001
